        public final Route[] routes
        Array of routes that share this one shared stop.

        Location (as a LatLng object) of the shared stop.

      • INITIAL_CIRCLE_SIZE

        public static final double INITIAL_CIRCLE_SIZE
        The initial size to set the largest circle to. Each of the subsequent circles are set to a smaller size dependent on this constant.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SharedStop

        public SharedStop(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng,
                  String stopName,
                  @NonNull
                  Route[] routes)
        Constructor for SharedStop. This not only sets the location, route, and name, but also initializes the circle options for the shared stop.

        It should be noted that while the circle options are set the circles are not initialized at this point.

        Parameters:
        latLng - The location of the shared stop.
        stopName - The name of the shared stop.
        routes - The routes that share this one stop (as an array). This cannot be null.

    • Method Detail

      • getSharedRoutes

        @NonNull
public static Route[] getSharedRoutes(Route route,
                                               int routeIndex,
                                               Stop stop)
        Gets the routes that share the provided stop by iterating through all routes, and comparing each route's stop to the provided stop to see if they match.

        If there are no matches then the size of the returned route array will be 1. This is because its the only route to have that stop in its stop array.

        Parameters:
        route - The route to compare against all other routes.
        routeIndex - The index of the route that we are comparing in all routes.
        stop - The stop to compare against all stops in all other routes.
        Returns:
        Array of routes that share the stop. This always return an array of at least 1+.

      • removeStopsWithSharedStops

        public static Stop[] removeStopsWithSharedStops(Stop[] stops,
                                                SharedStop[] sharedStops)
        Compares stops against shared stops and only returns the stops that are not shared stops.
        Parameters:
        stops - The original stops for the route that may be shared with shared stops.
        sharedStops - The shared stops for the route.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of stops that are unique to the route (not shared by any other routes or shared stops).

      • areEqual

        public static boolean areEqual(@NonNull
                               SharedStop sharedStop,
                               @NonNull
                               Stop stop)
        Compares the stop and shared stop name and location and returns whether or not both are the same.
        Parameters:
        sharedStop - The shared stop to compare.
        stop - The stop to compare.
        Returns:
        Whether or not they share the same name and location.

      • showSharedStop

        @UiThread
public void showSharedStop(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map)
        Sets the shared stop circles to be visible. Circles will be created at this point if they were non-existent before (null).

        This should be run on the UI thread.

        Parameters:
        map - The map to put create the circles on.

      • hideStop

        @UiThread
public void hideStop()
        Hides the shared stop.

        If there are any routes that are still enabled that belong to this shared stop then the stop will not be hidden.

        This must be run on the UI thread.

      • setCircleSizes

        @UiThread
public void setCircleSizes(double size)
        Sets the circles to the specified size. Each subsequent circle is set to a smaller size than the initial circle.

        This should be run on the UI thread.

        Parameters:
        size - The size to set the circles to.

      • removeSharedStopCircles

        @UiThread
public void removeSharedStopCircles()
        Removes all the shared stop circles from the map. This also set the circles to null (so the circles can be recreated later). This must run on the UI Thread.
